name: microMarkets
description:
Select a road type at the bottom (each type can only be used for 1 road). Click and drag from a market to create a road.

Select wagons and carts at the left. Wagons are placed on roads, and carts are placed on wagons. Deselect them after use to avoid problems drawing road. Wagons and carts both hold up to 6 items.

Pause play and fast-forward controls are at the top right.

Popups offer either 2 extra carts, or 1 extra wagon.

If a market is overflowing with over 10 items, it will give a warning. If it remains overflowing for 10 seconds, it's game over!

You get 1 score per item, no matter the colour.

Known Bugs:

  • Some menu text is distorted on the web build, but not on the windows build
  • Carts and wagons will get stuck if their destination is removed (market they are travelling to is removed from the route).   Fixed: Wagons will now complete their previous route, unloading all items if possible.
  • Road editing can be buggy if cart placement is selected.   Fixed
